Package edu.odu.cs.cs350

Class Anchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.odu.cs.cs350.Resource
      • edu.odu.cs.cs350.Anchor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinkExtraction
    public class Anchor
extends Resource
    This Anchor class extends the Resource class. It extracts the href attribute and the text between the opening and closing tags and classifies the link as intra-page, intra-site, or external.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Anchor.LinkType
      Enum for the type of link: intra-page, intra-site, or external.

      Returns the type of resource, which is always ANCHOR for Anchor objects.
